text: The 2007 Islands District Council election was held on 18 November 2007 to elect all 10 elected members to the 22-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:12.5%;" | 1 | style="background:red; width:87.5%;" | 7 |- | PD | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:20%;" | 2 | style="background:red; width:80%;" | 8 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2007 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2007 Islands District Council election
